text: David: Do you have any idea what this was about?
creator: ronnie.brunner@netcetera.ch

text:
Don't recall... All the image examples work ok, right?  But that's pretty
obvious from the summary...

Since example on websh.com works and code looks OK, and nobody remembers what
the complain was about, we just assume that it was fixed along the way once if
it really ever was a problem ...
